Scripts.OnMouseDown: -- Start moving the frame if the left mouse button is pressed. if (arg1 == "LeftButton") then this:StartMoving(); end
-- Start moving the parent frame if the left mouse button is pressed. if (arg1 == "LeftButton") then this:GetParent():StartMoving(); end
Scripts.OnMouseUp: -- Stop moving the parent frame. this:GetParent():StopMovingOrSizing();
